Instructions: Following the action shown below, **click on the person** you would like to friend
Hover over their profile picture, and you should see the words **\"View Profile\"** pop up. Click on this
Once you clicked in, you should see more information about the user. There should be a **\"Send a Friend Request\" button at the top right**. Click on that to send a friend request!
If the button grays out and says \"Friend Request Sent\", you are all set! \n\nFor information on how to **accept a friend request**, please type **!friends accept**
